direPiercing.name: Dire Piercing
direPiercing.description: Hits ignore %s-%s% of the target's Piercing resistance

direElectric.name: Dire Electric
direElectric.description: Hits ignore %s-%s% of the target's Electric resistance

direExplosive.name: Dire Explosive
direExplosive.description: Hits ignore %s-%s% of the target's Explosive resistance

direFlooding.name: Dire Flooding
direFlooding.description: Hits ignore %s-%s% of the target's Flooding resistance

direBurning.name: Dire Burning
direBurning.description: Hits ignore %s-%s% of the target's Burning resistance

combust.name: Combust
combust.description: Every hit deals an extra burst of %s-%s Explosive Damage

flood.name: Flood
flood.description: Every hit deals an extra burst of %s-%s Flooding Damage

sparks.name: Sparks
sparks.description: Every hit deals an extra burst of %s-%s Electric Damage

burn.name: Burn
burn.description: Every hit deals an extra burst of %s-%s Burning Damage

pierce.name: Pierce
pierce.description: Every hit deals an extra burst of %s-%s Piercing Damage

fix.name: Fix
fix.description: Increases Repair Amount by %s-%s per shot

antiBlast.name: Anti-Blast
antiBlast.description: Hits also reduce the target's build up of the Shell-shocked status effect by %s-%s%

insulator.name: Insulator
insulator.description: Hits also reduce the target's build up of the Stormstruck status effect by %s-%s%

douser.name: Douser
douser.description: Hits also reduce the target's build up of the Ablaze status effect by %s-%s%

sealant.name: Sealant
sealant.description: Hits also reduce the target's build up of the Flooded status effect by %s-%s%

reinforcer.name: Reinforcer
reinforcer.description: Hits also reduce the target's build up of the Punctured status effect by %s-%s%

brute.name: Brute
brute.description: Hits have a 16% chance to restore %s-%s Brace Strength to this ship

severity.name: Severity
severity.description: Hits have a 12% chance of dealing additional %s-%s% damage as Severe Damage

victorsRally.name: Victor's Rally
victorsRally.description: Destroying a target restores %s-%s brace Strength to this ship

graceOfTheWinds.name: Grace of the Winds
graceOfTheWinds.description: Hits have a %s-%s% chance to increase turn speed by 10% for 15 seconds. Effect can be stacked up to 3 times

energize.name: Energize
energize.description: Hits have a 16% chance to restore %s-%s% Crew Stamina to this ship

bloodthirst.name: Bloodthirst
bloodthirst.description: Destroying a target restores %s-%s% Crew Stamina to this ship

raider.name: Raider
raider.description: Increases build-up of the Vulnerable status effect by %s-%s%

deathblow.name: Deathblow
description: For targets with 25% Hull Health or less, hits have a %s-%s% chance to instantly destroy them
For Elite targets, the effect reduces remaining Hull Health by 3% instead of instant destruction

repairReadiness.name: Repair Readiness
repairReadiness.description: Hits have a %s-%s% chance to reduce any repair kit cooldown by 3 seconds

precisePatchwork.name: Precise Patchwork
precisePatchwork.description: Destroying a weakpoint restores %s-%s Severe Damage to this ship

restoreReadiness.name: Restore Readiness
restoreReadiness.description: Hits have a %s-%s% chance to reduce Restoration Kit cooldown by 3 seconds

tearing.name: Tearing
tearing.description: Increases damage by %s-%s% when hitting sails

roar.name: Roar
roar.description: %s-%s% of base damage builds up the Taunted status effect on targets

soulMending.name: Soul Mending
soulMending.description: %s-%s% of damage dealt by this weapon restores Hull Health

durableBuoys.name: Durable Buoys
durableBuoys.description: Increases Operation Time of buoys by %s-%s%

restorative.name: Restorative
restorative.description: %s-%s% of Repair Amount also restores Severe Damage

invigorate.name: Invigorate
invigorate.description: %s-%s% of Repair Amount also restores Crew Stamina

tranquility.name: Tranquility
tranquility.description: Hits also reduce the target's build up of the Taunted status effect by %s-%s%

sailorsRespite.name: Sailor's Respite
sailorsRespite.description: Hits have a 7% chance to repair target for %s-%s% the amount

strengthen.name: Strengthen
strengthen.description: %s-%s% of Repair Amount also restores target's Brace Strength

sailMender.name: Sail Mender
sailMender.description: Hits also reduce the target's build up of the Torn Sails status effect by %s-%s%

secondStorm.name: Second Storm
description: All Electric Damage dealt by this weapon is also dealt to a nearby target

overflow.name: Overflow
description: All Flooding Damage dealt by this weapon is applied as Severe Damage

sailRipper.name: Sail Ripper
sailRipper.description: The hit that triggers the Torn Sails status effect deals %s-%s% damage

winningStreak.name: Winning Streak
description: Every successful hit increases the damage of the next shot from this weapon by 3%, up to a maximum of %s-%s%
Missing a shot resets the effect

deadlyStrike.name: Deadly Strike
description: Shots have a 10% chance of dealing increased damage from any damage to weakpoint bonuses, even if the shot does not hit a weakpoint

highPressure.name: High Pressure
highPressure.description: Sea Fire weapons have 50m longer range and deal %s-%s% more damage

longArm.name: Long Arm
longArm.description: Hits that land at 70% of Maximum Range or further also deal %s-%s% more damage

providence.name: Providence
providence.description: %s-%s% of amount repaired by this weapon also repairs your ship

jointSupply.name: Joint Supply
jointSupply.description: Hits also repair the nearest allied ship for %s-%s% of the original Repair Amount

winningStreakRepair.name: Winning Streak (Repair)
description: Every successful hit increases the Repair Amount of the next shot from this weapon by 3%, up to a maximum of %s-%s%
Missing a shot resets the effect

preemptiveDefence.name: Preemptive Defence
description: Hits also grant 50 extra armor on the target for 10s. Effect can be stacked up to 5 times

empower.name: Empower
description: Hits also grant 3% extra Weapon Damage on the target for 10s. Effect can be stacked up to 5 times

longArmRepair.name: Long Arm (Repair)
longArmRepair.description: Hits that land at 70% of Maximum Range or further also restores %s-%s% more Repair Amount

acrid.name: Acrid
acrid.description: Every hit deals an extra burst of %s-%s Toxic Damage

direToxic.name: Dire Toxic
direToxic.description: Hits ignore %s-%s% of the target's Toxic resistance

antidotes.name: Antidotes
antidotes.description: Hits also reduce the target's build up of the Poisoned Status Effect by %s-%s%

rugged.name: Rugged
rugged.description: Reduces incoming damage by %s-%s while Bracing

determination.name: Determination
determination.description: Increases Brace Strength Recovery by %s-%s% per second

barbarian.name: Barbarian
barbarian.description: When Hull Health is below 25%, increases Weapon damage by %s-%s%

survivor.name: Survivor
survivor.description: When Hull Health drops below 25%, repairs %s-%s% Hull Health over 10 seconds. This effect has a 30 second cooldown

craftsman.name: Craftsman
craftsman.description: Increases Repair Amount of Repair Kits by %s-%s%

resilience.name: Resilience
resilience.description: Using a Restoration Kit grants %s-%s% reduction to all Secondary Damage for 5 seconds

supreme.name: Supreme
supreme.description: Increases the damage of special attacks launched from the Armor by %s-%s%

steelIntegration.name: Steel Integration
description: Every 1% of Piercing and Explosive resistance adds %s-%s Armor

coalesce.name: Coalesce
coalesce.description: %s-%s% chance that 50% of damage braced restores Hull Health. This effect only occurs after bracing ends

watcher.name: Watcher
watcher.description: Any damage taken while Bracing has a %s-%s% chance of being reduced by 1750

respite.name: Respite
respite.description: When Bracing damage, there's a %s-%s% chance to repair 500 Hull Health and 100 Severe Damage per second for the net 5 seconds. This effect has a cooldown of 10 seconds

jester.name: Jester
jester.description: Upon being afflicted with Taunted, increase Armor Rating and Brace Strength Recovery by %s-%s% for 15 seconds
